title: Resting Above the Deep
prophetic_word:
You are entering a season where the threats around you will no longer dictate the posture of your
spirit. What once provoked fear will become a backdrop to your God-given calm. Even surrounded
by hidden dangers, you will rest—because Heaven has declared that nothing beneath the waters
can overturn what God has placed upon you. Your peace is becoming your greatest weapon.

title: Always on Time
prophetic_word:
I come to you right when you need Me .. not late, not early, but perfectly on time.
When the waters rise and you feel yourself slipping beneath the waves, My hand is already reaching
for you. I have never once abandoned you, and I never will.

title: What Heaven Sees
prophetic_word:
You see limitation, but I see transformation. You see the ground, but I see the wings. I am calling
you to rise into the identity I have already placed inside you.

title: Pressed for Glory
prophetic_word:
The Season of Crushing Has Purpose
Just as olives must be pressed for oil to flow, the pressure you endured is producing something
precious. What was painful is now becoming powerful.

title: Come to my Safe House
prophetic_word:
I have set you apart to be a light in the quiet places. Even when no one seems to notice, your
faithfulness shines and guides others who are searching for safety. Your foundation is firm because
I am your rock. Keep your light burning — for soon, many will be drawn to the glow of My presence
in you.

title: Safe in His Arm
prophetic_word:
As you lean into Me, I am restoring your strength. What felt too heavy for you is light for Me. You
don’t need to fight this battle alone, let Me be your strength.

title: The Kneeling Warrior
prophetic_word:
Strength Found in Surrender
You win not by striving but by kneeling. Your greatest victories will come through your surrender,
your worship, and your willingness to bow before the One who strengthens you.

title: Refined by the Drop of His Glory
prophetic_word:
I am refining you, not to destroy you but to reveal the beauty I placed within you. Just as gold must
pass through fire to shine, so are you passing through a divine refinement that will reveal
My glory in you.

title: Net Breaking Harvest
prophetic_word:
Obedience Will Unlock Overflow
At My word, cast your net again. This time will be different. This is not a season of striving but of
obeying. Your obedience will bring increase, and your nets will not remain empty.

title: Bread to Eat and Seed to Sow
prophetic_word:
God Provides for Both Your Present and Your Future
The Lord is giving you bread for this season and seed for the next. You will not lack for today, and
your tomorrow will be secured by what He’s placing in your hands now.

title: Staff of Divine Authority
prophetic_word:
The staff represents the mantle of authority that you carry.
A mantle that was not earned by perfection but given by divine appointment. A mantle forged
through seasons of pressure, waiting, and surrender.
You are stepping into a chapter where you no longer pray for the waters to move…
You command them.

title: Overflow in the Vineyard of God
prophetic_word:
The old tree in the foreground represents you…. weathered, seasoned, and deeply rooted.
You have endured winds, pruning, and seasons that seemed barren, but every moment was
forming strength in your roots. Now, the very places that once felt painful or dry are producing the
heaviest fruit of your life.

title: Rise, Daughter of Royalty
prophetic_word:
I am crowning you in a place where no one thought to look.
You have walked through a long season where you felt unseen, uncelebrated, and overlooked—not
because you lacked value, but because I hid you for a time of forming. In the silence, I shaped your
character. In the shadows, I refined your voice. In the quiet places where no applause could reach, I
built a strength in you that adversity could not break.

title: The Leap That Changes Everything
prophetic_word:
A single act of obedience in this season will shift the course of your path. Don’t underestimate the
power of stepping out. Heaven is waiting to meet you in motion.

title: Leaving the Luggage of Yesterday
prophetic_word:
You are stepping out of a season where old burdens, histories, and identities once piled high behind
you. What used to define you no longer determines your direction. You now carry only one truth
into your future The Love of God.. This single declaration has more power than every weight you’ve
ever carried. Keep walking. Heaven is rewriting your journey with freedom, clarity, and divine
affirmation.

title: The Breaking That Births Freedom
prophetic_word:
This is the season where the chains that once held you are breaking under the weight of divine
intervention. What restricted you, confined you, or silenced your rise has lost its power. As your
arms stretch upward, heaven meets your reach. The path before you is widening, and the horizon
once obscured is now revealed. Every chain that falls releases clarity, strength, and identity. You are
stepping into a freedom that not only opens your view but also awakens your purpose.

title: Chosen Stone
prophetic_word:
God has selected you, shaped you, and set you apart. Though the path has been steep and rugged,
His hand has never left you. You will soon be lifted from the hidden place into a position of honor
and purpose.

title: Anchored in Hope, Ready to Rise
prophetic_word:
God has grounded you in a season of stability so you can step into your next assignment with
confidence. What held you steady was never meant to hold you back. The anchor kept you through
the storms, now the horizon is calling you forward.

title: Guided by the Flame of Heaven
prophetic_word:
You are not lost—Heaven is lighting your path. God’s fire is going before you, illuminating the way
through deep waters. Follow the light; it carries your next instructions and your next miracle.

title: Beyond the Border of the Ordinary
prophetic_word:
God is calling you out of the familiar edges and into supernatural influence. What you release in the
Spirit will reshape what is seen. You’re stepping into a season where natural limitations cannot stop
divine impact.

title: The Offering of Joy
prophetic_word:
Your praise is shifting the atmosphere around you. As you lift your gratitude toward Heaven, God is
transforming your fields into places of flourishing. Expect joy to rise and overflow
in unexpected ways.

title: The Day the Father Ran
prophetic_word:
Heaven celebrates your return before you ever finish your confession. The Father is not standing at
the door—He is running down the road to meet you. His love outruns your past, your failure, and
your fear. Today is not about what you lost, but about who you are: a beloved child restored.

title: Reflections of a Restored Season
prophetic_word:
You are entering a time where God heals both the seen and the unseen parts of your life. What is
visible on the outside will begin to match the beauty He has been cultivating within. Expect
harmony, balance, and restoration in unexpected places.

title: Guard Your Heart
prophetic_word:
The Lord is calling you into a season of holy protection over the deepest part of your being. Your
heart is the wellspring of your purpose, the seat of your identity, and the flame of His presence
within you. Heaven is placing a shield around what He has entrusted to you.
Guard your heart not in fear, but in wisdom.
Guard it, not by closing it, but by discerning what you allow to enter.
Guard it, because within it, God is igniting a fire that will shape your future…

title: Covered in the Shadow of Glory
prophetic_word:
As you bow in quiet surrender, Heaven stretches its wings over you. God is covering you with His
presence, shielding your heart, and surrounding your prayers with divine protection. You are not
praying alone, His glory rests upon you.

title: The Ascent Toward the Unseen Door
prophetic_word:
There is a door opening before you, elevated above the noise and color of your current season.
Though the steps seem suspended in uncertainty, each one you take is divinely placed. Walk
forward. What feels like a climb through the unfamiliar is actually your passage into a new realm of
purpose, illumination, and revelation. The door is not ahead by accident…
it has been waiting for you.

title: Time Melts, Purpose Remains
prophetic_word:
Seasons may shift and hours may feel unsteady, but your calling is unwavering. God is removing
the pressure of deadlines and restoring peace to your journey. What matters most is not the ticking
clock, but the One who authors your path.

title: Two Wings Bound, One Destiny Waiting
prophetic_word:
Both of your wings may feel restrained, pressed together so you cannot rise. But Heaven has not
forgotten your design. What seems like total limitation is only a pause in your divine
commissioning. God will release what holds you, and when He does, your ascent will be powerful,
purposeful, and unmistakable. You were created for lift, your time is coming.

title: Framed by Promise
prophetic_word:
What you see before you is not a distant dream but a promised reality. God is framing your future
with peace, clarity, and new beginnings. Keep your gaze steady—what’s ahead is divinely crafted.

title: The Quiet Invitation to New Journeys
prophetic_word:
Heaven is calling you into a journey marked by peace, beauty, and unexpected provision. What’s
ahead is not rushed; it’s prepared. You will step into places where rest and revelation meet.
You Are Entering a Season of Refreshing, Simplicity, and Divine Direction.

title: He Who Soars Carries Authority
prophetic_word:
I am teaching you how to soar above what once overwhelmed you.
I am shifting you from surviving to ascending.
There is a sense of motion and breakthrough, not calm skies but winds of change—winds that once
felt chaotic but are now becoming the very currents that lift you higher.
I have entrusted you with a key—authority, insight, and access. Doors that were closed will open,
and doors that were harmful will shut.

title: Words
description:
In the beginning was the Word, and
the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
(John 1:1)

title: with me
description:
Now in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went to them,
walking on the sea. And when the disciples saw Him walking on the sea,
they were troubled, saying, “It is a ghost!” And they cried out for fear.
But immediately Jesus spoke to them, saying “Be of good cheer” It is I;
do not be afraid. (Matthew 14:25-33)

title: Bali
description:
“My command is this: Love each other as I have
loved you. Greater love has no one than this: to lay down
one's life for one's friends.” (John 15:12-13)

title: of the world
description:
I am the light of the world. Whoever follows
Me will never walk in darkness, but will have the light of
life." (John 8:12)

title: Miracle
description:
“Jesus turning water into wine at Cana. When
the water in the purification jars ran out, Jesus turned the
water into wine—one that was even better than the wine
served earlier—demonstrating His power and glory. This
miracle is emphasized as the first of Jesus' signs, through
which He revealed His glory. The event also shows His
divine ability to do something extraordinary”. (John 2:1–11)

title: MARTHA a n d MARIA
description:
Now it came to pass, as they went, that he entered into a
certain village: and a certain woman named Martha received him into
her house. And she had a sister called Mary, which also sat at Jesus'
feet, and heard his word. But Martha was cumbered about much
serving, and came to him, and said, Lord, dost thou not care that my
sister hath left me to serve alone? bid her therefore that she help me.
And Jesus answered and said unto her, Martha, Martha, thou art careful
and troubled about many things: But one thing is needful: and Mary
hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her."
(Luke 10: 38-42). The passage contrasts active service (Martha) with
spiritual attentiveness (Mary). Jesus emphasizes the importance of
prioritizing time with Him over busyness.

title: JESUS
description:
For to us a child is born, to us a son is given;
and the government will be on His shoulders. And He will
be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting
Father, and Prince of Peace." (Isaiah 9:6)

title: LAMB GOD
description:
“And if he finds it, truly I tell you, he is
happier about that one sheep than about the ninety-
nine that did not wander off“. (Matthew 18:13–14) In
the same way your Father in heaven is not willing that
any of these little ones should perish.

title: KING KING
description:
And I saw heaven opened, and behold a
white horse; and he that sat upon him was called Faithful
and True, and in righteousness he doth judge and make
war. His eyes were as a flame of fire, and on his head were
many crowns; and he had a name written, that no man
knew, but he himself. And he was clothed with a vesture
dipped in blood: and his name is called The Word of God."
(Revelation 19: 11-13)

title: JESUS LOVES
description:
But Jesus said, 'Let the little children come to
Me, and do not hinder them, for the kingdom of heaven
belongs to such as these.” (Matthew 19:14)

title: PROOF GOD'S LOVE
description:
For God so loved the world that he gave his
one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not
perish but have eternal life." (John 3: 16). The sacrifice of
Jesus on the cross is the highest manifestation of God's
love for humanity.

title: THE SHEPHERD
description:
“I give them eternal life, and they shall never perish; no one will snatch them
out of my hand.”
prophetic_word:
“I have seen the wolves gather.
I have heard the growl of the enemy near your soul.
But fear not — you are cradled in My arms, and no evil shall lay a claw on you.
I AM your Defender. I shield you with My presence, and I silence the accuser with My blood.
Not one of Mine will be lost.”
John 10:28 (NIV)

title: your footprints were not seen.”
description:
“Your path led through the sea, your way through the mighty waters, though
your footprints were not seen.”
prophetic_word:
“Even when the waters rise and the waves roar, I lead you.
You are not alone in the deep.
I, your Shepherd, walk before you — and every storm bows to My voice.
Let the lighthouse of My presence be your guide,
and My peace be the ground beneath your feet.
You will not sink — you will walk, beside Me, to the other shore.”
Psalm 77:19 (NIV)

title: inwardly they are ferocious wolves.”
description:
“Watch out for false prophets. They come to you in sheep’s clothing, but
inwardly they are ferocious wolves.”
prophetic_word:
“My people, be watchful in this hour.
Not every voice that speaks in My name is sent by Me.
The wolves wear wool and hold My Word, but twist it with hidden fangs.
You will know them by their fruit — not their mask.
Stay close to My Spirit, and I will give you eyes to see, and discernment to guard the gate of
your soul. For the days are cunning, but I am your Shepherd still.”
Matthew 7:15 (NIV)

title: DROWN
description:
“When you pass through the waters, I will be with you; and when you pass
through the rivers, they will not sweep over you.”
prophetic_word:
“Even when the waves rise and the depths seem endless, I am with you. I see your struggle
beneath the surface — and I say: You will not go under. The waters will not consume you, for
My hand is holding you up. You are not forgotten, and you are not alone. Trust My voice
above the storm. I am the One who walks on water and lifts My beloved out of the deep.
I won’t let you drown.”
Isaiah 43:2 (NIV)

title: ARMS
description: “I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.”
prophetic_word:
“You were never lost to Me.
Even when you strayed, I came for you.
Now, I carry you close — not with judgment, but with joy.
You are Mine, and you are safe in My arms.”
John 10:11 (NIV)

title: FOR YOU
description:
“When you walk through the fire, you will not be burned; the flames will not set
you ablaze.”
prophetic_word:
“Even in the midst of raging fire, The Shepherd never takes His eyes off His sheep. He steps
into your furnace, not to watch you from afar — but to bring you out, unharmed, and wholly
His. You are not alone in the fire. You are fiercely loved, fiercely protected. He is closer than
the flames.”
Isaiah 43:2 (NIV)

title: IN THE EYES
description: “I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.”
prophetic_word:
“His gaze pierces through every fear, every wandering soul.
He sees you, knows you, and holds you close — not as a stranger, but as His beloved.
No wolf, no darkness, no valley is too deep for His reach.
In the storm or silence, you are never out of His sight.
He has called you by name — and He will never let you go.”
John 10:11 (NIV)

because the Shepherd stepped in front
of them before you even knew danger
was near. You have interpreted the
pressure around you as abandonment,
but Heaven calls it intervention.
The Shepherd isn’t asking you to
outrun what chases you—
He is asking you to rest in His arms
while He carries you out of danger.

Not lost in a crowd.
This represents your life and calling.
You have been placed in a position that may
feel out-of-the-way or unnoticed or quiet
or hidden.
But God wants you to know:
“I planted you here. This ground belongs to
you. And your growth is seen by Me.”

prophetic_word:
restrained, pressed together
so you cannot rise. But Heaven
has not forgotten your design.
What seems like total limitation
is only a preparation in your
divine commissioning. God will
release what holds you, and when
He does, your ascent will be
powerful, purposeful, and
unmistakable. You were created
for lift, your time is coming.
source_pdf: Carrot Card 6 x 9 cm fixed ttd.pdf

title: Carrot Card S1 — What you see before you is not
prophetic_word:
a distant dream but a promised
reality. God is framing your
future with peace, clarity, and
new beginnings. Keep your gaze
steady—what’s ahead is
divinely crafted.
source_pdf: Carrot Card 6 x 9 cm fixed ttd.pdf
